Hiss/Pyro/Breakdown/Scavenger/Dark One:



Hiss saw the grenade and leapt into the air, transforming to ray gun mode, 
the shockwave of the plasma grenade sending him flying through the air.  
Transforming to robot mode, he cupped his mouth, yelling towards Pyro.

"Pyro, get that worthless little whel----" he was interrupted as he slammed 
into a rock.

---

Pyro turned his cannon, firing off three fireballs at Rebelyell, not even 
feeling quills hitting him, all bouncing off his heavily armored tank mode.

---

Breakdown cursed as shots and quills dug into him, nearly tipping over him, 
but his weight held him in place.  He turned, firing off an explosive shell 
from his artillery mode at the Rodimus Prime look alike.

---

Scavenger continued driving for the Ark, re-firing on Rodimus Prime with 25 
shells from his machien guns, and three laser blasts from his laser cannon.

---

Dark One made another pass, this time opening fire with 20 rapid laser blasts 
down at Spears, laughing at how clever he was.
